sentences.en: "His memory must be completely back, then?" — "Just about."
sentences.cn: “这么说，他的记忆一定是完全恢复了？”——“差不多。”

sentences.en: &B{be off with} you!.
sentences.cn: 你滚开！。

sentences.en: Any head teacher who made errors like this would be chucked out.
sentences.cn: 哪个校长只要犯了这样的错误都会被开除。

sentences.en: Are my keys in the drawer?
sentences.cn: 我的钥匙在抽屉里吗？

sentences.en: Don’t disturb me while I’m working.
sentences.cn: 我工作的时候不要打扰我。

sentences.en: former Sex Pistol John Lydon (Rotten, as was).
sentences.cn: 过去的欲望枪手约翰•莱登（前称为罗登）。

sentences.en: Gemma was reading.
sentences.cn: 吉玛正在看书。

sentences.en: He did not like to be caught out on details.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢在细节上被人抓住把柄。

sentences.en: He isn’t leaving, is he?
sentences.cn: 他不会走吧？

sentences.en: I have a fair idea of how difficult things can be.
sentences.cn: 我大致了解情况会有多困难。

sentences.en: I wanted the front garden to be a blaze of colour.
sentences.cn: 我想让门前的花园变得五彩缤纷。

sentences.en: I'm away to my work.
sentences.cn: 我要去工作了。

sentences.en: Instead of complaining about what's wrong, be grateful for what's right.
sentences.cn: 别抱怨不好的事，要对好的事心存感恩。

sentences.en: Jane’s upstairs.
sentences.cn: 简在楼上。

sentences.en: More people would be attracted to cycling if conditions were right.
sentences.cn: 如果天气适宜，会有更多的人被吸引到骑自行车的行列中来。

sentences.en: my bride-to-be.
sentences.cn: 我未来的新娘。

sentences.en: My name is Susan.
sentences.cn: 我的名字叫苏珊。

sentences.en: She's going to be fine. She always was pretty strong.
sentences.cn: 她会好的。她一直都很强壮。

sentences.en: That guy’s always causing trouble.
sentences.cn: 那家伙总是惹麻烦。

sentences.en: The building he was lodged in turned out to be a church.
sentences.cn: 原来，他租住的那栋建筑是一座教堂。

sentences.en: The deal seems so attractive it would be ridiculous to say no.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易看上去太诱人了，要是拒绝它简直是笑话。

sentences.en: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
sentences.cn: 你是什么样的人和你想成为什么样的之间的差距就是，你做了什么。

sentences.en: The road to peace will be long and drawn-out.
sentences.cn: 通往和平的道路将很漫长。

sentences.en: These are my favourite pictures.
sentences.cn: 这些是我最喜欢的照片。

sentences.en: they've been and carted Mum off to hospital.
sentences.cn: 他们竟然强行把妈妈送到了医院。

sentences.en: they've been and carted Mum off to hospital.
sentences.cn: 他们竟然强行把妈妈送到了医院。

sentences.en: they've been and carted Mum off to hospital.
sentences.cn: 他们竟然强行把妈妈送到了医院。

sentences.en: They’ve been asking a lot of questions.
sentences.cn: 他们已经问了许多问题。

sentences.en: Three hundred million dollars will be nothing like enough.
sentences.cn: 3亿美元远远不够。

sentences.en: We’ll be starting in about an hour.
sentences.cn: 我们过一小时左右开始。

sentences.en: what are you at there?.
sentences.cn: 你在那儿干什么呢？。

sentences.en: What is right for us need not be right for others.
sentences.cn: 对我们来说是对的东西，对别人来说未必正确。

sentences.en: What will be the effect of the alliance between IBM and Apple?
sentences.cn: 若IBM公司和苹果公司联手将会有什么效果呢？

phrases.tran_cn: 支持；安慰（困难或不幸中的）某人
(非正式)（活动或生活方式的）根本特点；要旨

trans.tran_cn: 与过去分词连用构成被动语态，与现在分词连用构成进行时，用于反意疑问句
trans.tran_en: used with a present participle to form the  continuous 4  tenses of verbs
used with a present participle to form the  continuous 4  tenses of verbs

trans.tran_cn: (Be)人名；(缅)拜；(日)部(姓)；(朝)培；(中非)贝
有，存在，在（某处），（在某时或某地）发生
trans.tran_en: used to say that someone or something is the same as the subject of the sentence
